column2:
treat.df <- data.frame(
                    treatment <- c(rep(0, 10), rep(1, 10)),
                    imperfections <- c(8, 7, 6, 6, 3, 4, 7, 2, 3, 4, 9, 9, 8, 14, 8, 13, 11, 5, 7, 6)
                    )
    treat.fit <- glm(imperfections ~ treatment,
                    family = poisson(link = "log"),
                    data = treat.df
                    )
    summary(treat.fit)

glm(formula = imperfections ~ treatment, family = poisson(link = "log"), 
    data = treat.df)
Null deviance: 27.857  on 19  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 16.268  on 18  degrees of freedom
